statements: DELETE FROM snippets_data WHERE type = 'code' AND url = 'https://example.com';
DELETE FROM rich_snippets_table WHERE id = 10 AND name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM search_visibility_table WHERE page_url LIKE '%example.com%' AND category = 'Technology';
DELETE FROM rich_snippets WHERE price > 100 AND name = 'Product ABC';
DELETE FROM rich_snippets WHERE id = 100 AND type = 'product';
DELETE FROM improving_search_results WHERE search_term = 'SEO' OR search_category = 'Marketing';
